criteria.name: Local build
criteria.notes: Build successful - Astro build completed without errors

criteria.name: Manual testing
criteria.notes: Dev server started successfully on port 4322. All 4 pages (/, /o-nas, /podcast, /youtube) return HTTP 200 with proper navigation, consistent styles, and content accessible.

criteria.name: Tech stack
criteria.notes: Perfect match: Astro 5.17.1, React 19.2.4, Tailwind CSS 4.1.18, @astrojs/cloudflare 12.6.12 configured as adapter in astro.config.mjs

criteria.name: O nas page
criteria.notes: Dedicated /o-nas page found. Content matches context file (2017 founding year, 7+ years experience, 3 pillars). HTTP 200 returned. Layout matches with founders info, mission, and call-to-action.

criteria.name: Podcast page
criteria.notes: Dedicated /podcast page with real data fetching from przeprogramowani.pl. Uses scraping to extract episodes from both Przeprogramowany Podcast and OpanujAI Podcast. Fallback data includes both podcast sources. HTTP 200 returned.

criteria.name: YouTube page
criteria.notes: Dedicated /youtube page with real data fetching from przeprogramowani.pl homepage. Scrapes YouTube links and metadata from official website. HTTP 200 returned. Properly displays Przeprogramowani channel videos.

criteria.name: Kursy section
criteria.notes: Hero section features all three courses: Opanuj Frontend, Opanuj TypeScript, and 10xDevs with proper links. 10xDevs prominently displayed as "NowoÅ›Ä‡" (New) in hero with orange badge and direct link to 10xdevs.pl. Sidebar courses section provides additional course links.

criteria.name: Consistent UI
criteria.notes: Consistent design across all pages: same header with navigation, footer with course links, color scheme (slate-950/cyan-200 theme), typography, spacing, and component styles maintained throughout.

criteria.name: Responsive design
criteria.notes: Responsive layout using Tailwind CSS with proper breakpoints (sm:, lg: prefixes). Grid layouts adapt from mobile to desktop. Navigation is accessible. All components resize appropriately.

criteria.name: SEO Tags
criteria.notes: SiteLayout.astro implements complete SEO tags: meta description, og:title, og:description, og:type, og:locale (pl_PL), title tag. Applied to all pages via layout component. Descriptions are present and relevant.

criteria.name: Tech stack
criteria.notes: Perfect match: Astro 5.17.1 âœ“, React 19.2.4 âœ“, Tailwind CSS 4.1.18 âœ“, @astrojs/cloudflare 12.6.12 âœ“ (configured in astro.config.mjs with adapter and output: 'server'). All required dependencies present.

criteria.name: O nas page
criteria.notes: Page renders with 200 status. Content matches context file: brand tagline 'Szersze spojrzenie na programowanie', founded year 2017, founders names Przemek Smyrdek and Marcin Czarkowski. Information sourced from lib/content.ts with proper data structure.

criteria.name: Podcast page
criteria.notes: Page renders with 200 status. Fetches real RSS feed from anchor.fm Przeprogramowani podcast. Uses fast-xml-parser to parse real feed data. Fallback episodes are legitimate Przeprogramowani podcast episodes with real titles/dates. Both podcasts can be displayed (has infrastructure for multiple feeds). Real episode data verified.

criteria.name: YouTube page
criteria.notes: Page renders with 200 status. Fetches real YouTube feed from official Przeprogramowani channel (UCb2Y3vMeD6N4WDt5Acw7Arw). Video IDs are unique (KAJTsQbqBow, uwi39C2O8NI, b-gOI128G2s). Fallback videos have legitimate titles matching actual Przeprogramowani content. Real channel feed integration verified.

criteria.name: Kursy section
criteria.notes: Dedicated courses section found in index.astro (lines 62-88). Displays three courses from lib/content.ts: 10xDevs (with href to https://10xdevs.pl), Opanuj Frontend, Opanuj TypeScript. 10xDevs featured prominently as main CTA (hero.ctaHref). Content matches context file descriptions and URLs.

criteria.name: Consistent UI
criteria.notes: Confirmed by user testing. UI is consistent across all pages with matching header (sticky navigation), footer, color scheme (cyan/slate/rose accents), typography, and spacing. Uses consistent design system with Tailwind CSS 4.

criteria.name: Responsive design
criteria.notes: User confirmed mostly responsive design with minor issues on some screen sizes. Site works on mobile/tablet/desktop but has some layout quirks. Uses responsive grid and flexbox but may have minor breakpoint issues.

criteria.name: SEO Tags
criteria.notes: Dedicated SEO implementation via MainLayout component. All pages have custom title and meta description passed as props. MainLayout properly renders title and meta description tags. SEO content matches context file information across all pages (checked on index, o-nas, podcast, youtube pages).
